name: 2.0.0-milestone2
body:
### Changelog

 * [#1048](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/1048) - Bump logback-classic from 1.4.0 to 1.4.1
 * [#1047](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/1047) - Bump reactor-core from 3.4.22 to 3.4.23
 * [#1042](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/1042) - Bump mockito-core from 4.7.0 to 4.8.0
 * [#1037](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/1037) - Bump versions-maven-plugin from 2.11.0 to 2.12.0
 * [#1032](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/1032) - Bump smallrye-build-parent from 35 to 36
 * [#1031](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/1031) - Run the Reactive Streams Operators TCK again
 * [#1024](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/1024) - Bump logback-classic from 1.2.11 to 1.4.0
 * [#999](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/999) - Bump junit.version from 5.8.2 to 5.9.0
 * [#997](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/997) - ConcatMap operator without prefetch
### Breaking Changes

| Change                                | New API                                 | Justification  |
| ------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `.+org\.reactivestreams\..+` updated to `.+java\.util\.concurrent\.Flow\..+` | .+java\.util\.concurrent\.Flow\..+ | Migration from the legacy Reactive Streams APIs to the Java Flow APIs |

### Changelog

 * [#998](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/998) - Concatmap no prefetch – backport 1.x

name: 2.0.0-milestone1
body:

 * [#955](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/955) - Avoid wrapping scheduled executors
 * [#953](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/953) - Bump reactor-core from 3.4.18 to 3.4.19

 * [#950](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/950) - Bump version.surefire.plugin from 3.0.0-M6 to 3.0.0-M7

 * [#940](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/940) - Bump assertj-core from 3.23.0 to 3.23.1

 * [#937](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/937) - Bump mockito-core from 4.5.1 to 4.6.0

 * [#848](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/issues/848) - Remove Java 8 from GitHub Actions workflows
 * [#847](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/issues/847) - Integrate module-info.java to the main source tree and remove moditect

### Changelog

 * [#957](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/issues/957) - 1.6.0 backports

### Changelog

### Breaking Changes

| Change                                | New API                                 | Justification  |
| ------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `method <T> Multi<T> MultiReplay::ofMulti(Multi<T>)` updated to `method <T> Multi<T> MultiReplay::ofMulti(Multi<T>)` | method <T> Multi<T> MultiReplay::ofMulti(Multi<T>) | Not breaking. The annotation was missing and has now be added. |
| `method <T> Multi<T> MultiReplay::ofSeedAndMulti(Iterable<T>, Multi<T>)` updated to `method <T> Multi<T> MultiReplay::ofSeedAndMulti(Iterable<T>, Multi<T>)` | method <T> Multi<T> MultiReplay::ofSeedAndMulti(Iterable<T>, Multi<T>) | Not breaking. The annotation was missing and has now be added. |
| `method MultiReplay MultiReplay::upTo(long)` updated to `method MultiReplay MultiReplay::upTo(long)` | method MultiReplay MultiReplay::upTo(long) | Not breaking. The annotation was missing and has now be added. |
| `method MultiDemandPacing<T> Multi<T>::paceDemand()` has been introduced | method MultiDemandPacing<T> Multi<T>::paceDemand() | New Multi paceDemand experimental operator |
| `method Multi<T> Multi<T>::capDemandsUsing(LongFunction<Long>)` has been introduced | method Multi<T> Multi<T>::capDemandsUsing(LongFunction<Long>) | New Multi capDemandsUsing experimental operator |
| `interface Spy` updated to `interface Spy` | interface Spy | Not breaking. Experimental promotion.  |

### Changelog

 * [#863](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/863) - Avoid overflow when using ChronoUnit.FOREVER with the memoize operator

 * [#859](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/859) - Multi replay operator (experimental API)

 * [#855](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/855) - Bump awaitility from 4.1.1 to 4.2.0
 * [#854](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/854) - Run tests in random order

 * [#837](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/837) - Bump smallrye-common-annotation from 1.8.0 to 1.9.0
 * [#836](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/836) - JPMS open modules do not export packages
 * [#835](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/issues/835) - Issue with the new mutiny module-info.java (1.3.1)
 * [#831](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/831) - Avoid `Uni.join().first(unis).toTerminate()` with a concurrency limit

 * [#824](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/824) - Fix a Kotlin test timing issue due to slow starting coroutines
 * [#822](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/822) - Bump versions-maven-plugin from 2.8.1 to 2.9.0

### Changelog

 * [#817](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/817) - MultiOnRetry is ignoring the onFailure predicate
 * [#815](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/815) - Fix RevAPI filtering new syntax
 * [#810](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/810) - Bump maven-jar-plugin from 3.2.1 to 3.2.2
 * [#809](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/809) - Limit workflow concurrency (main CI/CD + PR check workflows)
 * [#808](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/808) - Improve breaking changes presentation
 * [#806](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/806) - Bump maven-jar-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.2.1
 * [#804](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/issues/804) - Magic sauce to nicely format RevAPI changes in GitHub releases
### Breaking Changes

| Change                                | New API                                 | Justification  |
| ------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `method void MultiRetry<T>::<init>(Multi<T>, Predicate<? super Throwable>)` updated to `method void MultiRetry<T>::<init>(Multi<T>, Predicate<? super Throwable>, Predicate<? super Throwable>)` | method void MultiRetry<T>::<init>(Multi<T>, Predicate<? super Throwable>, Predicate<? super Throwable>) | MultiRetry is an operator class (not user facing). The change adds support for the onFailure predicate |

### Changelog

 * [#803](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/803) - Bring back the JUnit5 RS TCK shim
 * [#802](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/802) - Remove deprecated RevAPI configuration for filtering and reporting

 * [#796](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/796) - Round of deprecation removals and misc cleanups ahead of 1.3.0
 * [#795](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/issues/795) - 1.3.0 round of deprecation removals
 * [#794](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/794) - Profile to run the RS TCK TestNG tests in parallel

 * [#781](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/781) - Properly propagate `Multi` cancellation to `Flow` when using `Flow.asMulti`

 * [#770](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/770) - Parallel tests execution
 * [#769](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/769) - Reduce tests flakiness, especially in CI / constrained environments
 * [#757](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/issues/757) - Context support
 * [#755](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/pull/755) - test(kotlin): create test to cancel deferred
 * [#739](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/issues/739) - Export less packages in module-info or open them all

### Breaking Changes

| Change                                | New API                                 | Justification  |
| ------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `method void UniAwait<T>::<init>(Uni<T>)` updated to `method void UniAwait<T>::<init>(Uni<T>, Context)` | method void UniAwait<T>::<init>(Uni<T>, Context) | Private API impacted by the new Mutiny context support |

### Breaking Changes

| Change                                      | New API                                 | Justification  |
| ------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| Addition of the `CheckReturnValue` annotation |                                       | This annotation is used by static code analyzers to inform the user of a potential misusage of the API.
| New `ifNoItem` group on `Multi`                   |                                         | This group allows handling timeouts on `Multi` |
| Change of parameter in `UniJoin.Builder<T>` | `UniJoin.Builder<T>::add(Uni<T>)` | Fix issues with parametric types in `Uni.join()` experimental APIs. The usage of `UniJoin.Builder<T>::add(Uni<? extends T>)` was erroneous |

 | Change         | New API          | Justification  |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------- |
| methods `apply` have been removed from all groups | Use `transform` instead | Deprecated API removal |
| methods `invokeUni` have been removed from all groups | Use `call` instead | Deprecated API removal |
| method `uni.onItem().produceCompletionStage(...)` has been removed | Use `transformToUni(Function)` and creates a new `Uni` from the `CompletionStage` | Deprecated API removal |
| method `uni.onItem().produceMulti(...)` has been removed | Use `transformToMulti(...)` instead | Deprecated API removal |
| method `uni.onItem().produceUni(...)` has been removed | Use `transformToUni(...)` instead | Deprecated API removal |
| method `multi.onItem().produceCompletionStage(...)` has been removed | Use `transformToUni(Function)` and creates a new `Uni` from the `CompletionStage` | Deprecated API removal |
| method `multi.onItem().produceIterable(...)` has been removed | Use `transformToIterable(...)` instead | Deprecated API removal |
| method `multi.onItem().produceMulti(...)` has been removed | Use `transformToMulti(...)` instead | Deprecated API removal |
| method `multi.onItem().producePublisher(...)` has been removed | Use `transformToMulti(...)` instead | Deprecated API removal |

| `method MultiSelect<T> Multi<T>::select()` has been introduced. |   |  New _select_ group, replace `multi.transform().first/test/filter`. If you are impacted by such a change, we recommend extending `AbstractMulti` instead of implementing `Multi` directly. | 
| `method MultiSkip<T> Multi<T>::skip()` has been introduced. |  
|  New _skip_ group, replace `multi.transform().skipX(...)`. If you are impacted by such a change, we recommend extending `AbstractMulti` instead of implementing `Multi` directly. | 
| `method Multi<T> Multi<T>::toHotStream()` has been introduced. |   |  New method to create a _hot_ stream, replace `multi.transform().toHotStream()`. If you are impacted by such a change, we recommend extending `AbstractMulti` instead of implementing `Multi` directly. |
